author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
review: The world-building in The Great Gatsby is simply extraordinary. The Great Gatsby has masterfully created a vivid and immersive setting that feels both familiar and fantastical. Whether it's exploring the bustling streets of Pride and Prejudice or venturing into the mysterious depths of Pride and Prejudice, every scene is brought to life with vivid detail and palpable atmosphere.As the plot unfolds.
